position.desc: Position within window of where QAjaxBar should be displayed

size.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name
size.desc_cn: 以CSS单位表示的大小，包括单位名称

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc_cn: 组件的来自Quasar调色板的颜色名称

skip-hijack.desc: Skip Ajax hijacking (not a reactive prop)
skip-hijack.desc_cn: 跳过Ajax劫持（不是被动的属性）

hijack-filter.desc: Filter which URL should trigger start() + stop()

returns.desc: Should the URL received as param trigger start() + stop()?

start.desc: Emitted when bar is triggered to appear

stop.desc: Emitted when bar has finished its job
stop.desc_cn: 当Ajax栏完成它的工作时发出

start.desc: Notify bar you are waiting for a new process to finish

speed.desc: Delay (in milliseconds) between progress auto-increments; If delay is 0 then it disables auto-incrementing
speed.desc_cn: 进度自动递增之间的延迟（毫秒）；如果延迟为0，则禁用自动递增

start.desc_cn: 通知ajax栏您正在等待新进程完成

increment.desc: Manually trigger a bar progress increment
increment.desc_cn: 手动触发条形进度递增

stop.desc: Notify bar that one process you were waiting has finished
stop.desc_cn: 通知ajax栏您等待的进程已完成
